Viewing the Visual Merge Menus

The main menu of the Visual Merge window includes the following options:

File

Exit

End this session of Visual Merge.

Edit

Undo

Undo the most recent edit.

Redo

Redo the most recently undone edit.

Cut

Cut selected text from the lower pane and copy it to the clipboard.

Copy

Copy selected text to the clipboard.

Paste

Paste the contents of the clipboard into the lower pane.

Encoding

Change file encodings.

Search

Find

Find the first occurrence of the search text.

Find Next

Find the next occurrence of the search text.

Next Difference

Move back to the previous difference.

Previous Difference

Move forward to the next difference.

Next Conflict

Move forward to the next text conflict.

Previous Match

Move back to the previous text conflict.

Options

Changes display and color options for Visual Merge.

Help

Help Topics

Display the contents of the help file.

About Visual Merge

See display release, copyright, and licensing information about Visual Merge.

 

Visual Merge Context Menu

The Visual Merge context menu appears when you right-click on a block of text. The options on this menu alter the text of the suggested merge file in the lower pane. They include the following:

Apply Change

Copies a block of text that has changed in the left or right pane to the lower pane.

Apply Both Changes

Copies a block of text that has changed in both upper panes to the lower pane. To do this, right-click one of the changed blocks, and select the command from the context menu.

Remove Change

Removes text that was added to the left or right upper pane from the lower pane. Also re-inserts text that was removed from the left or right pane in the lower pane.
